Upgrade Devices through PW EMS

PW EMS can upgrade supported devices with an upgrade software image file that is provided by your Parallel Wireless representative.

The upgrade software image file must be loaded on the local system (on which the web browser runs the PW EMS session) before starting the upgrade process. Software from the following device types can be downloaded from a local system and later activated (rebooted so they activate the new software). The following software image file prefixes help indicate the type of devices that are associated with them:

  • pw-bbu - Virtual Baseband Unit (vBBU)
  • pw-vnode - Virtual Radio Node (vNode) software that is installed on a vBBU that also contains updated software for cell devices associated with this vNode, such as Remote Radio Heads (RRHs) that connect to the access network.
  • Upload a Device Software Image
  • Upgrade vBBU or vNode Devices
  • View Device Upgrades
  • Delete a Device Software Image
    Use this task to delete one or more device software images from the Device Upgrade and Rollback window.
